text: John Michael "Mike" McConnell (born July 26, 1943) is a former vice admiral in the United States Navy. During his naval career he served as Director of the National Security Agency from 1992 to 1996. His civilian career includes serving as the United States Director of National Intelligence from 20 February 2007 to 27 January 2009 during the Bush administration and seven days of the Obama administration. McConnell was born and grew up in Greenville, South Carolina. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American admirals Category:Military people from South Carolina Category:People from Greenville, South Carolina Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:United States Directors of National Intelligence
title: John Michael McConnell
